Text: thanks Chris-Aksel, truly a cool download. such nice feeling to get the desired vid n aud quality (not a videophile desire though) especially after downloading such huge gb files. thanks n hatz off Chris-Aksel, tk care.

Great little film. Hand drawn animation in the style of 101 Dalmatians or similar Disney classics of the 60's-70's, with a very "French" or even "Japanese" (Hayao Miyazaki's works come immediately to mind) style of story.  Not for everyone, and a bit of a sad tale.
